support.title: DIGITAL GAME
support.descp:
+DIGITAL COPY OF THE GAME + PDF GAME MANUAL
(DRM-Free)
+BACKER EXCLUSIVE WALLPAPERS
To jazz up your screen.
+DEVELOPMENT POLLS
Participate in Backer ONLY polls to help with development decisions for the game.
+ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!

support.title: BETA ACCESS + BETA CREDIT
support.descp:
+PLAY THE BETA
Become a key factor to improving the development of Cede.
+BETA WARRIOR
Your name in the credits as one of our BETA WARRIORS
+ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!

support.title: KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRT
support.descp:
(tier exclusive)
+Along with the game you will receive a backer exclusive t-shirt designed by Kris Carter.
+ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS

support.title: DIGITAL COMPLETE
support.descp:
+DIGITAL ARTBOOK
Consisting of concept art, 3D sculpts, story, in game assets, fan art, and the best kept secrets behind the development of Cede fully charged into a PDF.
+FULL DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK
Musical intercourse with your eardrums.
+(2) TWO BACKER EXCLUSIVE COMBAT FARMING PLANTS
+BACKER EXCLUSIVE FAN ART SKINS & ALT. FINGER PAINTING SKIN FOR SEPH
+ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!

support.title: PHYSICAL ARTBOOK + 11X17 EXCLUSIVE PRINT
support.descp:
(tier exclusive)
CEDE SOFTCOVER ARTBOOK
+A softcover book printed in color with concept art, 3D sculpts, story, in game assets, fan art and the best kept secrets behind the development of Cede.
+11x17 KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE PRINT signed by Kris Carter our concept artist.
+ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
(EXCLUDING tier exclusives)

support.title: RUNESTONE QUOTE
support.descp:
PERSONAL IN-GAME CREDIT
+A quote of your choice engraved on an in game collectible runestone along with your name on the stone for choosing the quote.
+(3) THREE ADDITIONAL COPIES OF THE GAME
+ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
(EXCLUDING tier exclusives)

support.title: YOUR FINGER PAINTING ON SEPH
support.descp:
(tier exclusive)
+We will take your real finger painting and add it to an alternate skin on part of Seph's torso.
(This reward is limited to 4 backers as we will only fit 4 finger paintings on Seph's torso. Nothing Inappropriate of course!)
+(3) THREE ADDITIONAL COPIES OF THE GAME
+CREDIT FOR FINGER PAINTING
+ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
(EXCLUDING tier exclusives)

support.title: GRAPHITE DRAWING+COMPLETE PHYSICAL BOX
support.descp:
(tier exclusive)
+A unique hand drawing on bristol paper specifially for you of Seph and Lil Boi's. Signed, framed, and drafted by our very own concept artist, Kris Carter!
+Artbook and kickstarter exclusive print 11x17 SIGNED BY THE TEAM. Backer Exclusive T-shirt as well.
+ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
(EXCLUDING tier exclusives)

support.title: SHADOWBOX COLLECTORS ITEM
support.descp:
(tier exclusive)
+One of a kind custom made shadowbox signed by the whole team with background and foreground layers of game art glowing with LED lights.
+ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
(EXCLUDING tier exclusives)

support.title: DESIGN AN ENEMY FOR COMBAT FARMING
support.descp:
(tier exclusive)
+In-person(travel not included) or via skype, work with the team to develop an enemy along with the combat farming plant it transforms into. (Restrictions Apply.)
+(5) FIVE ADDITIONAL COPIES OF THE GAME
+SPECIAL CREDIT FOR ENEMY DESIGN
+ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
(EXCLUDING tier exclusives)

support.title: GRAND PACKAGE + RELEASE PARTY
support.descp:
+BareHand T-Shirt, Cede T-Shirt, Kickstarter exclusive print 11x17, limited edition softcover artbook, and limited edition physical box all signed by the whole team.
+MEMORIAL SHRINE LOCATION
In-game memorial shrine dedicated to your legendary self.
+PREMIUM CREDIT MENTION
+2 PASSES TO RELEASE PARTY
Chill with the team at our release party and get the insides on our development journey.
(Travel and hotel not included)
+ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS
(EXCLUDING tier exclusives)

support.title: EARLY BACKER DIGITAL GAME
support.descp:
+DIGITAL COPY OF THE GAME
Play it, toss it, or eat it. (DRM-Free)
+ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!
